name: ScarHeart
description:
In this game, you play as a scarred heart, trapped in an old graveyard, enveloped by darkness. Danger hides in every corner. You must survive as long as you can, and collect the blood of the dead. They will use whatever they have, to stop you. How much blood can you collect?

Some Info:

  • You move with the WASD keys, shoot with left click, and move your circle of light with the  mouse cursor.
  • You collect blood , by going over it. Bullets or explosions can destroy blood.
  • There's a special type of rare blood , infused with light. It will light up the entire graveyard for a brief moment.
  • Your enemies  are slow, but can catch you off guard if you don't pay attention. Watch out!
  • Over time, new types of enemies will appear, and they will spawn faster.
  • There's also a leaderboard, if you want to compete with other players.

I made the game by myself, and I'm a terrible artist, hope you like it though. Made for the Spooky 2D Jam 2022.

Thanks for reading, and have fun!
